caption: Categories
name: category
description: Initial working list of categories (work in progress).

findings.caption: Findings
findings.description: Findings events report findings, detections, and possible resolutions of malware, anomalies, or other actions performed by security products.

audit.caption: Audit Activity
audit.description: Audit events relate to the supervision of the system's access control model. Examples of such events are the success or failure of authentication, granting of authority, password change, entity change, privileged use, system state change, and resource access.

virtualization.caption: Virtualization Activity
virtualization.description: Hypervisor-based (virtual machine) and container-based virtualization activity events.
